<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/105395</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>105395</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>20101341</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Follow the Water</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Folgen Sie dem Wasser</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Suivez l'eau</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Siga a água</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Segua l'acqua</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ακολουθήστε το ύδωρ</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Siga el agua</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Water is a sculptor, a transport and a habitat creator among many other things.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wasser ist ein Sculptor, ein Transport und ein 
Lebensraumschöpfer unter vielen anderen Sachen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'eau est un sculpteur, un transport et un 
créateur d'habitat parmi beaucoup d'autres choses.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A água é um sculptor, um transporte e um criador
do habitat entre muitas outras coisas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'acqua è uno scultore, un trasporto e un 
creatore dell'habitat fra molte altre cose.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το ύδωρ είναι γλύπτης, μια μεταφορά και δημιουργός 
βιότοπων μεταξύ πολλών άλλων πραγμάτων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El agua es escultor, un transporte y un creador 
del habitat entre muchas otras cosas.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:CUAHSI-DK
FN:CUAHSI-DK
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>20101341</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution 3.0</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>

    <item>
